name: window-walker
title: Window Walker
description: Quickly switch between open windows. Search by app name or window title, minimize, close, or bring any window to the front.

commands.name: list-windows
commands.title: Switch Windows
commands.description: List all open windows and switch between them

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: nazzy_wazzy_lu
